Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: This is a very good phone, fast and simple to operate. It is small and comfortable to wear. You can expand the external memory up to 32 GB. so far works perfectly without a hitch.I am satisfied with the purchase

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson Mix Walkman
Reviews.Author: dude
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my son so I haven't used it any but he doesn't put it down and he hasn't complained about it, he's happy so I will give it five stars!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: it is a telephone for my little sister, it is very small but have a decent camera and its fine for carrying  some music, it does have any pretension but it works decently

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Amex
Reviews.Content: This is gift for my daughter and everything is perfect but missing a pink cloud! She' wil be little disappointed
